channel.title: Help help help
channel.description:
When i start runservewr sometimes it gives e this error
[code]Starting FireScape on 0.0.0.0:1234 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at server.run(server.java:136) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]
Help![br][size=1]Posted on: May 26, 2007, 11:37:49 PM[/size][hr]COME ON

item.title: Help help help
item.dc:creator: @Fireninja4000 Fireninja4000
item.description:
@Fireninja4000 wrote:

Thank you i changed if(clientListener != null && serverLock == false && server.banHandler.checkBannedIps() == false) { to [code] if(clientListener != null && serverLock == false && server.banHandler.checkBannedIps() == true) { /[code]

And it worked[/code][/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help help help
item.dc:creator: @Fireninja4000 Fireninja4000
item.description:
@Fireninja4000 wrote:

public static BanHandler banHandler = null; public static void calcTime() { long curTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); updateSeconds = 180 - ((int)(curTime - startTime) / 1000); if(updateSeconds == 0) { shutdownServer = true; } } public static int totalConnectCount = 0; public static int totalConnectTimer = 0; public static boolean serverLock = false; public static boolean restartServer = false; public int connectCount = 0; public int connectTimer = 0; public void process() { if(connectTimer > 0) { connectTimer--; } if(connectTimer == 0) { connectCount = 0; } if(totalConnectTimer > 0) { totalConnectTimer--; } if(totalConnectTimer == 0) { totalConnectCount = 0; } if(totalConnectCount >= 40 && restartServer == false) { antilag.ResetTimer = 9980; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "FireScape is possibly under attack - Restarting in a few seconds"; serverLock = true; restartServer = true; } } public java.net.Socket s; public String connectingHost; public void run() { try { shutdownClientHandler = false; clientListener = new java.net.ServerSocket(serverlistenerPort, 1, null); misc.println("Starting FireScape on "+clientListener.getInetAddress().getHostAddress()+":" + clientListener.getLocalPort()); while(true) { java.net.Socket s = clientListener.accept(); s.setTcpNoDelay(true); connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName(); if(clientListener != null && serverLock == false && server.banHandler.checkBannedIps() == false) { int Found = -1; for (int i = 0; i < MaxConnections; i++) { if (Connections[i] == connectingHost) { Found = ConnectionCount[i]; break; } } if (Found < 3) { misc.println("ClientHandler: Accepted from "+connectingHost+":"+s.getPort()); playerHandler.newPlayerClient(s, connectingHost); connectCount++; connectTimer = 10; totalConnectCount++; totalConnectTimer = 40; if(connectCount > 3) { appendToNull(connectingHost); s.close(); }

here ya go

Read full topic
